page.title: 13ASHBY HEIGHTS
page.content: Ashby Heights is a fairly new housing estate approximately 2.5km from Ashby town centre.It has been built on Norris Hill There are about 200 houses onthe estate.A small group of shops serves the community.A primary school is situated on the north of the development. The houses are mainly detached two story dwellings or bungalows.They are all privately owned.The average price for a house in 1985 is Â£34 000_this would be for a three bedroomed property. There is no industry on the estate so people have to travel to nearby towns such as Ashby,Coalville,Burton on Trent and Derby. Secondary school children go to Ivanhoe High and Ashby Grammar school.
